website_summaries.verdict: This basic set is an excellent option for beginners. Makes a great gift for anyone learning the art of bonsai.
pros: An entry-level kit that includes the basics of bonsai
a rake, brush, trimmer, and tweezers
We love that the rake and brush are made of bamboo
Comes in a case that's perfect for gifting
cons: Not enough tools for the serious bonsai grower
Trimmers may not work on thick plants

customer_reviews.title: Great starter Bonsai tool set!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set! Bought it with a Bonsai tree kit for my significant other & he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyD.

customer_reviews.title: Bonsai newbee
customer_reviews.text: I like my tools very much. Being new to the practice I haven't had a chance to use all the tools yet, but when it comes time I'm glad I have all that I need to shape and care for my mini tree. thanks
customer_reviews.author: swan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of tools
customer_reviews.text: These bonzai plant tools are really great for the price. The set includes everything you will need to maintain your bonzai plants and the quality is good too. I recommend this tool set for anyone taking care of bonzai plants, whether it's your first plant or if you've been growing bonzais for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Good tool set, good price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I think this tool set is what I was looking for. I primarily wanted good pruning scissors which this kit comes with two of, and I just viewed the rest of the stuff as bonuses. The two scissors work great, are sharp and are great size and quality. The wooden shovels look great for decoration, haven't really used them-- I guess I might down the road when I re-pot the plant, and the rake works ok for fluffing up the soil a bit. Great long tweezers for pruning. The bamboo brush thing is really stiff and kind of useless but I didn't care about it much.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Dobratz

customer_reviews.title: This set is the worst, put the money towards a good set
customer_reviews.text: This set is awful, when I unpacked it it stunk to the High Heavens like oil, and it wouldn't even come off my hands with soap. So I threw the bag in the washer and it seemed a lot better. I put the tools in the dishwasher and the scissors came out rusted oh, and that stink would not come out of my dishwasher. Aside from that the wood was dislodged from the shovel unit. It's just a cheap horrible set, I'm going to eat the $13 on this but I want everyone to be aware that this is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Earwaxius

customer_reviews.title: Great tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little kit. I’ve been using it for succulent hardens rather than bonsai and it was just what I wanted/needed. I do not recommended the little spades for pulling weeds in hard packed soil though. The metal is soft and I had to rebend mine back into place a couple of times and I’m worried it will break. Still worth the money in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Got here in good shape, and sent quickly
customer_reviews.text: Got here in good shape, and sent quickly. The metal part had fallen off the shovel, but it's really easy to put a little glue in there, and stick it back on. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Old Hands
customer_reviews.text: Great resource for indoor and outdoor gardeners. A sharpness that has yet to become dull and extremely easy to use - even with these old hands of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: This tool set is dope
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son his first bonsai tree for his desk. I wish these tools came with instructions on how to use them so the tree won’t just be looking all crazy.
customer_reviews.author: katy

customer_reviews.title: great for bonsai projects  Novice
customer_reviews.text: Small and great for bonsai projects Novice who want to see if this Is something they are interested in without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Mora

customer_reviews.title: These are great little nipper scissors
customer_reviews.text: These are great little nipper scissors. I'm left handed and most scissors don't work well for me, but these do.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Coulon

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for a small garden!
customer_reviews.text: the tools arrived quickly and are just what I wanted for my small winter herb garden. The quality is good and although I haven't used all of them yet it is a nice collection of what you need. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: J Sailor

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised and Quality Set
customer_reviews.text: My husband is happy with it as he cares for his baby bonsai. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bonsai tool kit
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy, well made little bonsai tool kit. I like the envelope pouch it comes in - no more searching for small tools - they’re stored all together. I’m very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the product. Haven't used it yet. I want to learn bonsai tree growing. So thank you very much for your tools.
customer_reviews.author: marykwellman

customer_reviews.title: They're one of the best deals going
customer_reviews.text: They're one of the best deals going. Compact, simple and well built, these trimmers are all you need for light work
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit, has everything you need for Bonsai care! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jaimeyfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Working well all are the same size and very sharp
customer_reviews.author: Mark R. Baller

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and I'm happy with the quality of the tools.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fair

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Seller.
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set. Love my purchase and the correspondence I received. It added that personal touch. Fast shipping as well.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Tool kit
customer_reviews.text: Decent little set but I wish it had a pick in there.
customer_reviews.author: jake greenway

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so much fun to keep up on my tree with
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Duffy

customer_reviews.title: I love them and plan on using them for stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest little trimmers. I have arthritis in my thumbs and these fit perfectly. They came so fast just in time for harvest season. I love them and plan on using them for stocking stuffers. Thanks.....
customer_reviews.author: Julie Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quick delivery. They hold up to daily use
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeE

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I brought my bonsai already mature so I have not needed to prune anything yet but, I can't wait to use my kit.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner's kit!
customer_reviews.text: The case was very nice and all the necessary tools for a first time bonsai owner were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Matcuk

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginners Set
customer_reviews.text: A great set of tools that work great for my bonsai. The sheers are very sharp and the other tools do their jobs well.
customer_reviews.author: Sean901

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have only used the rake d/t bought the Bonsai tree at the same time. Thank you for checking :)
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: It's charming but we need more information--also the rake fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: NONsturdiness,. Afraid of using this--cheap pieces put together. Spendid ides and idea about people taking up bonsai--but people aren't as sophisticated as you think and you should have enclosed something.
customer_reviews.author: Rosaly Roffman

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my re-potting of my Bonsai
customer_reviews.text: It was what was recommended for the task I had. So we'll see how my plant does.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Pribyl

customer_reviews.title: I enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner just getting into this hobby, it was on time and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Anony-mouse

customer_reviews.title: They are a perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tools. They are perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Product arrived promptly and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Subdude

customer_reviews.title: The Bonsai Tools were excellent
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the tools. The scissir and other cutting instrument were very sharp and easy to handle. It also came with a bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great product 10 out of 10 Would buy again =)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gensman

customer_reviews.title: Not so stellar but worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Goof purchase for the price, the scissors are not very good quality. This set is designed for the smaller bonsai types.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus diaz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, but what I received was in pieces. Very poor quality, the base of the 'tools' won't stay attached to the posts. I guess you truly do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: KimtasticVoyage

customer_reviews.title: He is really happy with everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband for Father's Day. I also bought him a Bonsai tree. He is really happy with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very hard to criticize this item for this price. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Welsh (7/28)

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The tools do what they need to do. They probably will fall apart on first use but easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: bert webb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a bonsai beginner
customer_reviews.text: Not sturdy for my liking but for the price it is good. Perfect for a bonsai beginner.
customer_reviews.author: xochitl garza

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: package was open, only 2 trimmers in kit, should've been 5 pc.
customer_reviews.author: ACV

customer_reviews.title: Love these trimmers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these trimmers for the price. Gets the job done and cheap enough to toss in the trash after I'm done trimming.
customer_reviews.author: Armand C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy..
customer_reviews.text: These palm sized trimmers exceeded my expectations. Yesterday, I used them to trim my orchids and their roots.....they are very sharp. It was just one clean cut. Their size makes it very easy to get the tips into the crotch of the stems. Voila! I dried them well and applied a light oil prior to putting them away. Today, I was using them for snipping waxed Irish linen in a beading project. They make very precise cuts. I did not oil the second pair because I didn't want to get oil on the linen. So, I will use 2-3 pair on my potting bench for flowers and another 1-2 pair in my beading basket.
customer_reviews.author: Landseergirl

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: All products were very well made, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Helen 4747

customer_reviews.title: Read the grower's instructions!
customer_reviews.text: The tools are of good quality and came with a beautiful pouch for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheesy set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheesy set, ok for brand new beginners i guess. If you have ever owned proper tools dont waste your money on these. Rake is curved too much to be useful, i cut the ends, and the bamboo brush is total garbage, i use it for tamping soil.
customer_reviews.author: Brett R. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Used the bonsai tools today along with the paste. Really nice kit. Got the job done with no issues. Love the mix of cutters, tweezers and the rake. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ENC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Been using them since I got them, wish they were dog proof but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Tools!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband. He used them the same day he received them, and he loves them. They are perfect for what he needs them for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little set of tools, couldn't have asked for more!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: product looks as good as described
customer_reviews.text: Product purchased as a gift. Arrived on time, looks good and like it will work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Stolt

customer_reviews.title: SO AFFORDABLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good deal. All you need. Works perfectly with my small carmona.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Kunda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new clippers, they work perfectly for my trimming needs and they arrived extremely quick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this set for my husband who has a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband who has a thirty year old bonsai (and a new baby bonsai, as well). He is really excited to have genuine bonsai tools to trim and maintain the tree. He hasn't used the tools yet, as he's deciding how to shape the tree. My only criticism is that it took a long time to get the tools. This was a Christmas gift, and I was afraid they weren't going to arrive before Christmas. They did arrive a couple of days before, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Missing items. I would not recommend for purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic cylinder it came in was broken, like it had be crushed by something. It was missing the Bonsai trimmer and the Bonsai tweezer. I would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Montes

customer_reviews.title: Missing items. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I only recieved 2/4 items listed. Build quality is very poor. Waste of money. Would absolutely not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: bro dude

customer_reviews.title: Only received 4 shears
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for a friend. Friend received them and informed me that only 4 shears were in the package. Supposed to be 5. Apparently one got lost somewhere along the line. Not worth the trouble to return for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Bill

customer_reviews.title: Buy better quality
customer_reviews.text: The rake is unusable because the tines are curled under. The clippers are not nearly sharp enough and not very sturdy. I feel like I was damaging my tree when I tried to trim it! Spend the money on good tools!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn9

customer_reviews.title: Finger pinchers!
customer_reviews.text: These are very sharp which is good, however there is a tendency for pinched fingers if one is not very careful!
customer_reviews.author: Beverlee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: these tools are well made and just what I needed to do my bonsai
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Planters' Choice Bonsai Tool Kit - Includes: Wooden Rake, Long & Wide Spades, Scissors, Tweezers, Bamboo Brush, and Pruning Shears (Trimmer/Clipper) in Fabric Storage Holder : Bonsai Tools (Tool Kit)
feature_bullets: 🌱 EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO CARE FOR YOUR BONSAI, IN ONE STYLISH CASE: PRUNING SHEAR and SCISSORS to cut twigs, smaller branches, leaves or roots easily. Pair of TWEEZERS to remove dead leaves, insects, weeds and other fine debris. BAMBOO BRUSH to enhance your bonsai tree, BAMBOO RAKE to plane or rake the surface of the soil when repotting, and 2 SPADES (long & wide).

🌱 PREMIUM QUALITY: Everything is made with only the finest steel and bamboo, as you would expect from the Planters' Choice brand. And it comes NEATLY PACKAGED in a stylish STORAGE CASE so that it makes a great gift for your friend or family.

🌱 The SHEARS and SCISSORS are made from quality steel, have a double-reinforced spring handle and its blades are sharp and oiled ready to cut any hard surface. The TWEEZERS are made from quality stainless steel, is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in your hand, and comes with a plastic tip protector.
🌱 The RAKE and SPADES are made from quality steel with solid wood handles. The BAMBOO BRUSH is made from quality bamboo, with just the right amount of toughness.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars144 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
